body_html: My vote would be no. As @jekbradbury said there's only very limited availability of nvlink systems (because they require POWER), and even then, a single nvlink between host and device, which is what they have, is not much faster than PCIe.
body_text: My vote would be no. As @jekbradbury said there's only very limited availability of nvlink systems (because they require POWER), and even then, a single nvlink between host and device, which is what they have, is not much faster than PCIe.
body: My vote would be no. As @jekbradbury said there's only very limited availability of nvlink systems (because they require POWER), and even then, a single nvlink between host and device, which is what they have, is not much faster than PCIe.
